subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My First File
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Cool Becca. Sounded like you used the allophone file for the raw audio. Ive had some good results using Stefans evpmaker software. 

Misty


--- On Thu, 7/31/08, Rebecca <harvesthearth@...> wrote:

> From: Rebecca <harvesthearth@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] My First File
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Thursday, July 31, 2008, 7:30 AM
> I just posted part of a recording from yesterday (still
> going through
> all of them).  This was recorded at the farm I grew up on,
> where my
> brother and his family now live.  My two nieces (age 17 and
> 21) have
> had various occurrences there so we thought we'd try
> out some of this
> new stuff and see what we'd get.  We got quite a few
> interesting
> results I think.
> 
> This is part of one where we asked if they are there, and
> then how
> many are there. This one was made with EVPMaker (the RS
> 20-125 didn't
> work so well out in the country - maybe not enough
> noise/sounds for
> them to use??)  The answer is "We are at eight, Yeah,
> there are
> eight."  I think it's pretty clear.
> 
> What do you think?
> 
> ~ Becca
